verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6953>Preacher<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
What <S%H3504>profit<s%> has a <S%H120>man<s%> of all his <S%H5999>labor<s%> which he <S%H5998>takes<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>?
One <S%H1755>generation<s%> passes <S%H1980>away<s%>, and another <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%>: but the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5975>stays<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> also <S%H2224>arises<s%>, and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goes <S%H935>down<s%>, and <S%H7602>hastens<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H2224>arose<s%>.

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south<s%>, and turns <S%H5437>about<s%> unto the <S%H6828>north<s%>; it whirls about <S%H1980>continually<s%>, and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> returns <S%H7725>again<s%> according to his <S%H5439>circuits<s%>.

All the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>run<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; yet the <S%H3220>sea<s%> is not <S%H4392>full<s%>; unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> from from where the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%>, there they <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3212>again<s%>.

All <S%H1697>things<s%> are full of <S%H3023>labor<s%>; <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H1696>utter<s%> <S%H5869>it<s%>: the eye is not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7200>seeing<s%>, nor the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H8085>hearing<s%>.
The thing that has <S%H6213>been<s%>, it is that which shall be; and that which is done is that which shall be <S%H6213>done<s%>: and there is no <S%H2319>new<s%> thing under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.

Is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> whereof it may be <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, this is <S%H2319>new<s%>? it has been <S%H3528>already<s%> of old <S%H5769>time<s%>, which was before <S%H6440>us<s%>.
There is no <S%H2146>memory<s%> of <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2146>things<s%>; neither shall there be any memory of things that are to <S%H314>come<s%> with those that shall come <S%H314>after<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> and search <S%H8446>out<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> concerning all things that are <S%H6213>done<s%> under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: this <S%H7451>severe<s%> <S%H6045>hardship<s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> to be exercised with <S%H6031>it<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H4639>works<s%> that are <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%>; <S%H1892>and<s%>, behold, all is vanity and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
That which is <S%H5791>crooked<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> be made <S%H8626>straight<s%>: and that which is <S%H2642>wanting<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> be <S%H4487>numbered<s%>.

I <S%H1696>talked<s%> with my own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1431>Behold<s%>, I am come to great estate, and have <S%H3254>gotten<s%> more <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> than all they that have been <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%H3820>Yes<s%>, my heart had <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H7200>experience<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1947>madness<s%> and <S%H5531>wickedness<s%>: I <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that <S%H1571>this<s%> also is <S%H7475>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
For in <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H3708>grief<s%>: and he that <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H4341>sorrow<s%>.
